channel.title: Lara Hogan on Adrián Moreno Peña · Web & Mobile Developer, all-around coder

item.title: Resilient Management
item.description: Guide for managers on how to build and maintain a resilient team, with a focus on creating a positive work culture and setting clear goals and expectations. Hogan offers practical strategies for managing stress, communicating effectively, and leading with empathy in order to foster a resilient and high-performing team.
